divourerEnabled.description: Label next to toggle switch for tool indicating that Divourer is active

divourerDisabled.description: Label next to toggle switch for tool indicating that Divourer is inactive

hiddenAmount.description: Title of popup counting amount of hidden elements. Number is placed before eg. '1 hidden element on this tab'

elementSingular.description: Singular for element. Placed in hiddenAmount placeholder

elementPlural.description: Plural for element. Placed in hiddenAmount placeholder

placeholderHiddenAmount.description: Placeholder for hidden counter text. This is only shown when the tool can not be enabled

contextHideElement.description: Context menu title for hiding element where the mouse if hovering
